sentences.english: Thanks to the many talented people who have shared their recipes with us.
sentences.chinese: 在此還要感謝曾經與我們分享這些原創食譜的天才們。

sentences.english: But Berti says he's not just teaching recipes.
sentences.chinese: 他聲稱自己遠非僅僅教授食譜。

sentences.english: I'd prefer something more practical. Like the exact recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜歡比較實際的東西，比如確切的食譜。

sentences.english: And beyond that, swap them for White Jars when you're doing Light Crystal recipes.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，他們掉白水晶瓶子當你做輕食譜。

sentences.english: By the crook, the cook saw through a cookbook before production nailed cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在溪邊，廚子在做鉤形餅乾之前查閱了一本食譜。

sentences.english: Have a Meatless Monday recipe you think we should try?
sentences.chinese: 難道你不認爲我們應當試試上面的食譜嗎？

sentences.english: Eat an anti-inflammatory diet filled with fruits and vegetables of a variety of colors.
sentences.chinese: 飲食安排爲抗炎的食譜，要有各種顏色的蔬菜水果。

sentences.english: When Cheryl asks, "Why did you steal my recipe?"
sentences.chinese: 當謝麗兒問起“你幹嘛偷我食譜？”

sentences.english: The more variety you build into your diet, the less you stick to it.
sentences.chinese: 節食譜花樣愈多，則堅持力愈少。

sentences.english: As soups in this cookbook are mildly nutritious, they are, therefore, suitable to be consumed all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 本食譜內的湯品，皆是清潤溫補，宜四季飲用。

sentences.english: This cookery book have being wrote by a real epicure.
sentences.chinese: 這本食譜是由一位真正的美食家寫的。

sentences.english: Add a little curry to your diet.
sentences.chinese: 給你的食譜上添加一點咖喱。

sentences.english: I wish there was a cookbook for life.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望有本生活的食譜。

sentences.english: By the crook, the cook looked through a cookbook before makinghooked cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在溪邊，廚子在做鉤形餅乾之前查閱了一利食譜。

sentences.english: Recipes used for Choose Your Foods are “on file” with this data.
sentences.chinese: 《選擇你的食物》中所用的食譜也存儲這些數據。

sentences.english: Her casserole recipes. But we hate them.
sentences.chinese: 她的亂燉食譜，但是我們恨它們。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
